hanzi-su-wiki:
酔

Значения

Опьянеть; страдать от морской болезни; увлекаться; напиться, быть пьяным

Мнемоника

Основательно прикладываться к бутылке 酉.

Варианты

醉
purpleculture_pinyin:
zuì
Japanese variant of 醉
Японский вариант 醉
rtega_mnemonic:
醉醉RS
酔酔		intoxicated, drunk, addicted to
  • leave a soldier 卒/卆 alone with a bottle 酉 and he'll be drunk and soon addicted
  • ⓢ 90 卆 bottles 酉: drunk
heisig_constituent: drunk, whiskey bottle, ninety, nine, baseball, ten, needle
Keyword_KANJIDIC: drunk, feel sick, poisoned, elated, spellbound
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: пьян, чувствуют себя больными, отравленный, приподнятое, завороженные
koohiiStory1: God you´re drunk! How many whiskeys did you have? 9? 10?
koohiiStory2: Whiskey with 90 percent alcohol will get you drunk. I don´t care who you are.
jp_example_words:
麻酔(ますい): anaesthesia
酔う(よう): get drunk, become intoxicated
酔っ払い(よっぱらい): drunkard
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have an alcohol nine times stronger than any other drink in a bottle shaped like a cross and you drink it all and become drunk. You’re like, so drunk right now from all that alcohol. Nine times more drunk than ever before.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel how drunk you are as you look at the cross shaped bottle that once held the alcohol. See the cross start to blur in front of you from how drunk you are.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you drink so much that you become drunk, then your alcohol will begin to taste like water. What is the reading of 水? It's すい, which is the reading for this kanji.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Speaking of 水, you need to drink some. You need to rehydrate and 水 is the best way to do it. Drink a lot of 水. Go. Now.
Ru_Meaning: drunk, feel sick, poisoned, elated, spellbound
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 酸 (すい、サン кислота).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you had nine out of ten (卆) sake flasks (酉) you'd certainly be drunk

酔字的基本解释

酔
zuì
古同“醉”。

酔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuì］
［《廣韻》將遂切，去至，精。］
亦作“酔1”。
(1)饮酒适量。
(2)饮酒过量，神志不清。
(3)沉迷；陶醉。
(4)昏愦，糊涂。
(5)以酒浸物。
(6)通“悴”。憔悴。

酔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　酔； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1281第13
【字彙】俗醉字。

酔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
酔字的起名意思

暂无。

酔
Basic explanation of words
酔
zuì
Gu Tong is "drunk".
酔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuì］
["Guangyun" will then cut, go to the end, fine. ]
Also known as "酔1".
(1) Drink moderately.
(2) Excessive drinking and unconsciousness.
(3) Addiction; intoxication.
(4) Faint and confused.
(5) Take wine infusion.
(6) Through "Haggard". Haggard.
酔

Old glyph
酔
Name meaning
Nothing.
zuì
яп. вм. 醉
Radicals: 酉, 九, 十  (alcohol, nine, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have an alcohol nine times stronger than any other drink in a bottle shaped like a cross and you drink it all and become drunk. You’re like, so drunk right now from all that alcohol. Nine times more drunk than ever before.
Feel how drunk you are as you look at the cross shaped bottle that once held the alcohol. See the cross start to blur in front of you from how drunk you are.
Reading Mnemonic
If you drink so much that you become drunk, then your alcohol will begin to taste like water. What is the reading of 水? It's すい, which is the reading for this kanji.
Speaking of 水, you need to drink some. You need to rehydrate and 水 is the best way to do it. Drink a lot of 水. Go. Now.

十 (десять), 九 (девять), 酉 (знак Петуха)
Не путать: 酸 (すい、サン кислота).
